name: Decode

projects.title: LinkedIn Clone
projects.description: Made this LinkedIn clone using React . In this project, a user can log in using firebase google authentication, after login user can write a post, upload images, and videos in the firebase database, and can view their post in real-time.

projects.title: Spotify Clone
projects.description: Made this Spotify controller app using react. I have used Spotify Developers API to fetch the user's data and playlist from Spotify servers in this project.The web app can be used to play, pause songs playing on the primary device.

projects.title: WhatsApp Clone
projects.description: Created WhatsApp Messaging App using FullStack MERN. Frontend is made using React, For backend I have used Node.js, Express for server and MongoDB as backend. Authentication is done using google Authentication of firebase.Frontend is deployed on firebase and backend is deployed on heroku

projects.title: CovidTracker App
projects.description: Made this CovidTracker App using React . In this project, users can view worldwide as well as countrywide cases. Data is fetched via Disease.sh API to display real-time coronavirus cases. Leaflet is used to show active cases, recovered cases, and deaths.

services.title: Websites
services.description: Our website development service offers comprehensive solutions for businesses and individuals seeking to establish a strong online presence. Our expert team of web developers utilizes the latest web technologies to create visually appealing, user-friendly, and functional websites. Whether you need a simple static website or a dynamic, interactive platform, we tailor our services to meet your specific requirements. From responsive design to seamless navigation, we prioritize creating engaging experiences that captivate visitors and help you achieve your online goals.

services.title: Mobile Applications
services.description: Our mobile application development service specializes in creating innovative and feature-rich mobile apps for iOS and Android platforms. Leveraging the power of modern technologies like React Native, we develop cross-platform applications that offer native-like performance and user experience. Our experienced mobile app developers work closely with you to understand your objectives and create customized solutions that cater to your target audience. From concept to deployment, we ensure a seamless development process and deliver high-quality, intuitive mobile applications.

services.title: Web Designs
services.description: Our web design service focuses on crafting visually stunning and intuitive user interfaces that elevate your online presence. Our creative team of designers combines artistic flair with user-centered design principles to create captivating web designs that resonate with your brand identity. We emphasize usability, responsive layouts, and attention to detail, ensuring that your website offers a seamless and visually pleasing experience across different devices. Whether you need a redesign of an existing website or a brand new design from scratch, we provide tailored solutions that make a lasting impression on your visitors.

aboutpara: We are a team of highly skilled engineers, data scientists, and designers work collaboratively to create intelligent software products tailored to meet the unique needs of their clients. These solutions leverage the latest advancements in technology to unlock valuable insights, enhance operational efficiency, and drive growth for businesses across various sectors
